experiment_name: LevSeq: Rapid Generation of Sequence-Function Data for Directed Evolution and Machine Learning (cis)
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature;    reaction_ph:7.6;    reaction_other_conditions:E. coli whole-cells harboring protoglobin variants;     5% MeCN;     anaerobic (0-30 ppm O2);     16 hours reaction time;     IPTG (0.5 mM) and ALA (1.0 mM) used for protein expression/induction;    reaction_substrate_concentration:1a: 10 mM, EDA: 15 mM
